about_the_game:
--- expections ---

- many walls
- much black
- green guy standing ( army guy or idk )
- bad dlc
- grass in ground that is black
- tents that are not good anyway
- ultra cool thing called no content pretty much

-- to be honest this dlc doesnt contain alot of stuff --

--- developer opinion ---

the dlc doesnt contain anything intresting just a another boring dlc and stuff like that the dlc tells about how player signs up into army
and then the war ends and then the game ends when u talk to wall so yeah thats the whole game just a another boring dlc for finland corruption simulator
- edit -

no

--- technical info ---

- game resolution is 640x480
- not so well done graphics
- you can watch over to left and right with A and D keys
- you can move forward and backwards with W and S keys
- most of the time you can continue after messages with C
- you can exit the game with ESC

--- controls ---

- ESC to exit
- C to continue after text or message
- W to go forward
- S to go reverse forward
- A to turn left
- D to turn right

--- video ---

- you can resize the window
- resolution: 640x480
- aspect ration on default: 4:3

--- how to stop game ---

launch the game ( see "how to run" ) for it
now when the game is running press "ESC"
to leave that you probably do straight away

--- story ---

you sign up to army then you win the war
then you go talk to wall

--- info ---

dlc doesnt contain any shooting
dlc is boring
just save your time and dont get this dlc

--- how to run ---
you need the main game to run this dlc
when you have the main game choose dlc launcher
to run dlc and im pretty sure that you run it by pressing F2
after you have the dlc in dlc launcher so yeah

name: finland corruption simulator - the war

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel xeon E5-1620 v3
  • Graphics: Nvidia Quadro M4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel xeon E5-1620 v3
  • Graphics: Nvidia Quadro M4000
  • DirectX: Version 11

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas ilícitas
Temas sensíveis

short_description: boring dlc nothing in it you should not get this or its your choice but i suggest to not get this dlc also you will be playing as a guy not female and you join a army and then you win a war then you talk to wall also the game has cool movement you dont need mouse to play only WASD and ESC for exit:D
